On a leap day before the year 2008, a joke was removed from the Wikipedia page for ‚ÄúDragon‚Äù. What was the phrase that was removed? Give the phrase as it appeared on the page, but without punctuation.
================================================================================
Step 1 - Current Task Input:
On a leap day before the year 2008, a joke was removed from the Wikipedia page for ‚ÄúDragon‚Äù. What was the phrase that was removed? Give the phrase as it appeared on the page, but without punctuation.

   URL: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Common_Era
   Description: history offensive,' Lori Weintz wrote, in a letter to National Geographic publishers.¬†... 'The forward to your book says B.C. and A.D. were removed so
